mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_tbl ( user_id, product_id, quantity, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{product_id}, #{quantity}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.user_id, c.product_id, p.product_name, c.quantity, p.price, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET quantity = #{quantity}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE cart_id = #{cart_id}
